survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for E-Commerce Delivery Services
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers about their satisfaction with e-commerce delivery services, including delivery speed, packaging quality, and overall experience.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall delivery experience from our e-commerce platform?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall delivery experience from our e-commerce platform?

questions.question_text: How would you rate the speed of your most recent delivery?
questions.client_notes: Ensure options cover a range of expectations to capture nuanced feedback.

script.question_text: How would you rate the speed of your most recent delivery?

questions.question_text: Was your order packaged securely and arrived undamaged?
answer_options: Yes, all items arrived in perfect condition
Most items arrived in good condition
questions.client_notes: This question helps assess packaging quality and handling during transit.

script.question_text: Was your order packaged securely and arrived undamaged?
answer_options: Yes, all items arrived in perfect condition
Most items arrived in good condition

questions.question_text: Please describe any issues you encountered with your delivery (if applicable).
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Some items were damaged' or 'Most items were damaged' in Q3
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to allow detailed feedback on specific issues.

script.question_text: Please describe any issues you encountered with your delivery (if applicable).
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Some items were damaged' or 'Most items were damaged' in Q3

questions.question_text: How likely are you to use our e-commerce platform again based on your delivery experience?
questions.client_notes: This question measures customer retention likelihood.

script.question_text: How likely are you to use our e-commerce platform again based on your delivery experience?
